name: Legend of Pocahontas
overview: This is a Playstation game based on the story of Pocahontas (a Native American woman who married an Englishman, John Rolfe, and became a celebrity in London in the last year of her life. She was a daughter of Wahunsunacock (also known as Chief or Emperor Powhatan), who ruled an area encompassing almost all of the neighboring tribes in the Tidewater region of Virginia (called Tenakomakah at the time). The game includes: - Cartoon film - Jigsaw puzzles - Colouring game
